product_title: Argento Vivo Personalized Dangle Charm Necklace
product_description: Celebrate loved ones with a customized necklace that displays their unique name with dangling charms in 18-karat-gold plate or sterling silver.
product_details_and_care:
Celebrate loved ones with a customized necklace that displays their unique name with dangling charms in 18-karat-gold plate or sterling silver.
18" length; 2" extender
Lobster clasp closure
Sterling silver with 18k-gold plate or sterling silver
Imported
Item #5907971
product_size_info:
This item must be personalized.
Specify up to 8 letters of your choosing in the Personalized Name box.
All letters will be capitalized; no special characters are available.
